## PopulatableMoneyp.sendBPD() method

Send BPD tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendBPD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedMoneypTransaction<P, SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of BPD to send. |

Promise&lt;[PopulatedMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.populatedmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;
